cboCostEstimates.description: As Amended by Amendment Number 49 (Pallone, McMorris Rodgers)
cboCostEstimates.title: Estimated Direct Spending and Revenue Effects of H.R. 7666, Restoring Hope for Mental Health and Well-Being Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 76 (Friday, May 6, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PALLONE:
H.R. 7666.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: [The Congress shall
have Power] To regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among the several States, and with the Indian Tribes.
[[Page H4723]]
[Page H4722]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

title: Restoring Hope for Mental Health and Well-Being Act of 2022
